original_title: ผู้หญิงคนนี้ไม่ใช่ผี
overview: A woman's odd behavior makes everyone around her wonder if she's possessed or a ghost. Her husband is driven into the arms of a mistress and her best friend seeks guidance from a spirit doctor until she's found dead. The friend's boyfriend then decides to get the bottom of things.
title: This Woman Is Not a Ghost
